00012 #include <ClanLib/core.h>
00013 #include <ClanLib/application.h>
00014 #include <ClanLib/display.h>
00015 #include <ClanLib/gl.h>
00016 #include <ClanLib/sdl.h>
00017 
00018 #include "Preferences.h"
00019 #include "GameEngine.h"
00020 
00021 #define RENDER_SDL false
00022 #define RENDER_OPENGL true
00023 
00024 /**
00025  * Main application
00026  */
00027 class Application : public CL_ClanApplication
00028 {
00029 public:
00030 
00031   /** Main Window */
00032   CL_DisplayWindow *window;
00033   /** Used to have a callback event when user close the window */
00034   CL_Slot quit_event;
00035   /** Rendering used - OpenGL or SDL */
00036   bool render;  
00037 
00038   GameEngine *game;
00039 
00040   /**
00041    * Initialise the game
00042    */
00043   void init()
00044     {
00045       CL_SetupCore::init();
00046       CL_SetupDisplay::init();
00047       
00048       if(RENDER_OPENGL == render)
00049       {
00050         CL_SetupGL::init();
00051       }
00052       else
00053       {
00054         CL_SetupSDL::init();
00055       }
00056 
00057       window = new CL_DisplayWindow("OpenAlchemist",800,600);
00058 
00059       
00060       Preferences *pref = pref_get_instance();
00061       if(pref -> fullscreen)
00062       window -> set_fullscreen(800,600,0,0);
00063 
00064       // Add a callback when user close the window
00065       quit_event = CL_Display::sig_window_close().connect(this, &Application::stop);
00066 
00067       game = new GameEngine(window, render);
00068       game -> init();
00069   
00070     }
00071 
00072   /**
00073    * Stop the application
00074    */
00075   void stop()
00076     {
00077       game -> stop();
00078     }
00079 
00080   /**
00081    * Quit the application
00082    */
00083   void quit()
00084     {
00085       CL_Display::sig_window_close().disconnect(quit_event);
00086 
00087       delete game;
00088       
00089       delete window;
00090 
00091       if(render == RENDER_OPENGL)
00092       {
00093         CL_SetupGL::deinit();
00094       }
00095       else
00096       {
00097         CL_SetupSDL::deinit();
00098       }
00099      
00100       CL_SetupDisplay::deinit();
00101       CL_SetupCore::deinit();
00102 
00103       delete pref_get_instance();
00104 
00105       exit(0);
00106     }
00107 
00108  
00109   /**
00110    * Application main function
00111    */
00112   virtual int main(int argc, char **argv)
00113     {
00114               
00115       bool dont_run_game = false;
00116 
00117       Preferences *pref = pref_get_instance();
00118       render = pref -> render_opengl;
00119 
00120       // Checking parameters
00121       for(int i = 0; i < argc; ++i)
00122       {
00123         if(strcmp(argv[i], "--sdl")==0 && render != RENDER_SDL)
00124         {
00125           render = RENDER_SDL;
00126           pref -> render_opengl = false;
00127           pref -> write();
00128          
00129         }
00130         if(strcmp(argv[i], "--opengl")==0 && render != RENDER_OPENGL)
00131         {
00132           render = RENDER_OPENGL;
00133           pref -> render_opengl = true;
00134           pref -> write();
00135           
00136         }
00137         if(strcmp(argv[i], "--help")==0)
00138         {
00139           help();
00140           dont_run_game = true;
00141         }
00142         if(strcmp(argv[i], "--license")==0)
00143         {
00144           license();
00145           dont_run_game = true;
00146         }
00147         if(strcmp(argv[i], "--maxfps")==0 && i < argc-1)
00148         {
00149           std::string arg(argv[i+1]); 
00150           int maxfps;
00151           std::istringstream istr(arg); 
00152 
00153           if(istr>>maxfps)
00154           {
00155             pref -> maxfps = maxfps;
00156           }
00157           else
00158           {
00159             dont_run_game = true;
00160             std::cout << "Option maxfps must be followed by a number." << std::endl;
00161           }
00162           
00163         }
00164         if(strcmp(argv[i], "--cb")==0)
00165         {
00166           pref -> colorblind = true;
00167           pref -> write();
00168          
00169         }
00170         if(strcmp(argv[i], "--nocb")==0)
00171         {
00172           pref -> colorblind = false;
00173           pref -> write();
00174          
00175         }
00176         
00177         
00178       }
00179 
00180       if(!dont_run_game)
00181       {
00182         try
00183         {
00184       
00185           this->init();
00186           game->run();
00187           this->quit();
00188                
00189         }
00190         // Catch any errors from ClanLib
00191         catch (CL_Error err)
00192         {
00193           // Display the error message
00194           std::cout << err.message.c_str() << std::endl;
00195         }
00196       }
00197 
00198 
00199       
00200       return 0;
00201     }
00202 
00203   /**
00204    * Display the help informations
00205    */
00206   void help()
00207     {
00208       std::cout << "OpenAlchemist v0.3 -- Help" << std::endl
00209                 << "Usage: openalchemist [OPTIONS]"  << std::endl  << std::endl
00210                 << "Options:"  << std::endl
00211                 << "\t--cb : Active colorblind mode"  << std::endl
00212                 << "\t--help : Show this message"  << std::endl
00213                 << "\t--license : Show the license of this program"  << std::endl
00214                 << "\t--maxfps X : Limit framerate to X"  << std::endl   
00215                 << "\t--nocb : Unactive colorblind mode"  << std::endl
00216                 << "\t--opengl : Use OpenGL as render target" << std::endl
00217                 << "\t--sdl : Use SDL as render target (default)" << std::endl
00218         ;
00219     }
00220
